report.title: My Favorite Drug
report.author: Poop
report.bodytext: I have used Kratom a couple of times and loved it each time. I have experimented with weed, percocet, xanax and alcohol and I have to say that Kratom is my favorite drug by far. /n /n I usually use around 8 grams of powder. I take dissolve it in warm water than pour orange juice over it to diffuse the taste which I find works rather well. /n /n In all my experiences I have found Kratom to induce a very relaxing and calm feeling. Also, I experience pretty intense euphoria for about 3 hours. After the 3 hour mark the effects start to fade and usually take another 3 hours to completely wear off. /n /n One thing that does suck about Kratom is I am usually left with a headache and a burnt out feeling similar to weed. All in all, Kratom is awesome!
